short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides additional survey information to assist API usage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension toggles allows you to display question and answer IDs on surveys in order to assist integration with the ServiceTick API.

If you would like to learn more about using ServiceTick, visit http://www.servicetick.com/contact/.
